content:
Paula Branco is an Assistant Professor at the School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science in the University of Ottawa, Canada.
Her main research interests are focused on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning with a special focus on imbalanced domains, outlier detection, anomaly detection, cost-sensitive and utility-based learning, fraud detection and cybersecurity.

title: Paula Branco
